issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When I'm trying to send push-notification from https://platform.axway.com/#/api/data/***/default/push or via cURL using REST API it doesn't go throught. 

I can see push-notification in logs, but status is:Failure with the following message:
Exception Type: APNS; Error Code: 1001; Error Message: General Problem; Catched Exception: Received fatal alert: internal_error

Or another one was with message: Exception Type: APNS; Error Code: 2010; Error Message: Socket is closed; Catched Exception: Socket Closed

No matter development or production environment.
fields.summary: Internal error while sending push notifications to ios via Mobile Backend Services

comments.body:
Hello,
Thanks for reaching out to us. Can you please share us a sample test project to reproduce the issue on our end? Also provide your complete error logs and environment details.
